hl.seg: France has supported the proposal.

doc.seg: The Chairman of the Committee of the Summit, Mushahid Hussain Syed said in the Committee meeting on Friday at the Parliament House about the proposal on the relief goods to Palestine and that a Parliamentary delegation has been sent.
After the meeting, Mushahid Hussain Syed said to the representatives of media that the Committee at France has welcomed the proposal for the relief work for the affected people in the Gaza Strip.
He said that the Israeli attack is a crime on humanity and that all the countries should condemn the attacks.
Mushahid Hussain while criticizing the world to double standards said that the people should be against terrorism, but they are still against the Palestinians in the attacks.
The foreign affairs Minister in the Senate Standing Committee Chairman and the leaders of the Muslim Ummah were also criticized.
He said that the Committee expressed hope that the newly elected President of the United States Barak will address the Muslim Ummah in his first one hundred days.
Mushahid Hussain Syed said that Muslims and the West would give not only the emergency steps for Kashmir but also for the long standing problems like Palestine.
Imaduddin Khan, the Minister of External Affairs and the state of the committee said that Saudi Arabia attended the meeting for the foreign ministers of the Islamic countries of the Organization.

The emergency meeting by Israel as the result of the attacks was summoned. He said that the fashion of Palestine is aware and that the Government of other countries should be in touch with leaders in this regard.
minister of state for foreign affairs has said that the issue of Palestine should be resolved in accordance with the resolutions of the United Nations.
two journalists from Arab countries also joined the conference and they told about the latest situation in Palestine.
in Islamabad, students of the International University demonstrated protest against the Israeli attacks on Palestine.
the protesters were holding banners and placards having anti Israel slogans written on it.

hl.seg: abstention from dieting in order to avoid Flu.

doc.seg: This research from the American Scientists have come up after the experiments on rats.
in has been proven from experiments that rats put on diet with less calories had less ability to resist the Flu virus.
research has proven this old myth wrong that its better to fast during fever.
according to the scientists one should eat a lot during fever.

the researchers from the Michigan State University say that the rats on dieting had less power to resist the infection and their chances of dying had increased whereas rats on normal diet had better resistance against the Flu virus.
According to Professor Elizabeth Gardner, people who do dieting will not be effected with flue sooner but also they will take more time to recover from it.
she also said that those people who have taken the flue vaccine should also avoid dieting during few months of winter.

hl.seg: 'first nuclear experiment was done in 1990'

doc.seg: Thomas Reid who has worked in the Lever national laboratory of America as a Weapon designer, has written this book with the help of the Ex director of technical intelligence at Las Elmos national laboratory, Dani Stillman.

this book was titled, 'Nuclear Express: political history of bomb and its proliferation' and both writers have claimed that which ever country first made a nuclear bomb either stole the nuclear secrets of another country or they had the support of another nuclear power.
in an interview with US news, Thomas Reid said that in 1990 during Benazir Bhutto's rule, China experimented Pakistan's first nuclear bomb.
Thomas Reid said that based to many reasons, he has a belief that China had experimented Pakistan's first nuclear bomb.
the reasons include the design of the bomb and some information retrieved during talks with the Chinese scientists.
he further added that this was the reason that in 1998 only in a span of two weeks and three days, Pakistan was able to carry out nuclear experiments as a reply to Indian nuclear experiments.
Thomas Reid reminded that in 1961 Russia suddenly carried out a nuclear experiment and besides possessing the bomb for a long time, it took 17 days for America to carry out nuclear experiment.
He further said that in May 1998, the atom bomb that Pakistan tested was made with a lot of care and Pakistani scientists were completely trusted for it.
When Thomas Reed was asked this question that China supplied atomic technology to Pakistan so he said in his answer that India is a mutual enemy of Pakistan and China.
He said that its evidence is also present that Dr. Abdul Qadir Khan has used the Chinese model. Later the documents received from Libya also confirm this.
Another question that is it common to do nuclear experiments mutually. Then he said that Anees Sonway openly performed a nuclear experiment in the desert of Nevada for Britain.
He said that we also predict that Israel also has access to the results of this experiment.
Thomas Reeds was also asked if China is continuing nuclear proliferation?
On this Thomas Reeds said that China has been supplying raw material, instructions and the design to a nuclear facility of Iran in its city Asfahan.
Apart from this, China has also provided Iran with an enrichment plant in Kheeraj.
He said that China had been providing nuclear technology to Iran, Rome, Pakistan, Egypt, Libya and Yemen via North Korea.

hl.seg: Year 2008 the most successful for Madonna.

doc.seg: This show was organized around Madonna's album 'Hard Candy' and it also included Ukrainian gypsy band and Justin Timberlake's one or two songs.
An old racing car was also showed on the stage.
Celine Dion's show in year 2008 was the second best show from revenue point of view in which two thirty six million dollar's were made.
Canadian show 'Taking Chances' visited twenty four countries where as Madonna visited only seventeen countries which was her first tour in last eight years.
The director of shows of both singers was Jimmy King, who also organized the tour 'Reunion' or 'Spice Girls'.
Madonna has broken her own record in 2006
In 2006 in 'confession concerts' she made one ninety three million dollars.
Polestar has declared Bon Jovi third most successful singer who had made one hundred and seventy million dollars.
Bruce Springsteen has made one hundred and sixty million dollars and he stands fourth, and Police stood fifth by making one hundred and twenty six million dollars.
According to this magazine in year 2008 very few people in North America had attended concerts and musical events and only those people participated who were willing to buy expensive tickets.
In America a ticket is increased by an average of 8 percent by cost yearly, Most expensive ticket was sold of 300 dollars at Madonna's show.
The editor of Pollster Gary Bongioni said in prospect of international financial crisis year 2008 proved to be good.
He predicted 2009 a good year for U2 and Springsteen whose albums are about to release.

hl.seg: Ban on coeducation: Taliban

doc.seg: Local Talibans of Gul Bahadur group have distributed a pamphlet in Miran Shah (Capital of Southern Waziristan) and in other Tehsils in which government and semi government coeducational institutes have been threatened.
Pamphlet included that if coeducation institutes are not closed till 5th of January, action will be taken against them.
Pamphlet said that women are banned to have ID Cards for government aid and for educational purposes and women are prohibited to go to NADRA's Offices in all Tehsils.
The announcement on the ban of women ID Card has been made at the time when almost 200 women have submitted forms in NADRA Offices in Southern Waziristan for Benazir Income Support Program.
According to local people the pamphlet issued by Taliban was announced on the loudspeakers of all the Masjids.
However it was not mentioned in the letter that separate educational institute for woman are banned or not.
According to the pamphlet, after this announcement, if woman gets caught when out to get education or get her ID made, she and her family will be given a legitimate punishment.
Besides this, in the area of Bannu, the police says that a tunnel of gunpowder was blasted on Sunday on Bannu Mir Insha Road, from which one pedestrian died and one was injured.
Injured was admitted in Bannu civil hospital.

hl.seg: Target Killing: More dead bodies found.

doc.seg: According to the police, on the morning of Sunday, two dead bodies were found from the areas of the main Mangora, Green square and Sohrab khan square, in which their heads were separated from their bodies.
The deceased were told to be related to Frontier core and the police.

An eye witness said that a letter was also found near the dead bodies in which there was a threat that who ever picks up these dead bodies before 11 in the morning, he is responsible for his own death.
Locals say that the dead bodies were lying the market until 11am but later the security officials picked both the dead bodies and transferred them to the hospital.
There has been a dangerous rise in the target killing during the last few weeks in the main city Mangora and the surrounding areas.
In which local citizens including women and security officials are being killed
according to local sources, more than thirty people have been killed to date in these kind of incidents.
so far no organization has taken responsibility of these killings.

the spokesman of the local Taliban in Swat Muslim Khan told on Saturday that the dead bodies found on Friday included those of his fellows and also included the dead body of the Taliban commander in Deolai, Rafiullah.
Muslim Khan said that Rafiullah was under custody of the security forces for the past one and half month.
he had said that the local taliban send notice before killing any one. On the other hand common citizens are worried about these incidents in Mengora.
according to the local people, a large number of security forces are deployed in Mengora but despite of this the attacks on the citizens are ever increasing.

hl.seg: Musical tribute to Benazir from Bakhtawar.

doc.seg: A rap song (a modern style of music) in Bakhtawar's voice has been posted on youtube as well.
This 5 minutes long song contains pictures and video clips of Benazir.
Eighteen years old Bakhtawar is a student at the Edinburgh University.
she has great interest in poetry and singing.
it is said that apparently after the appreciation from her mother she had started singing songs as a hobby.
while paying a tribute to her mother she has said that she was an intelligent and beautiful lady, she did every thing with style.
regarding the 27th December incident she said that she the bullet was fired at her temple, she left us at the age of 54 and left three children amongst residuals.
the whole nation is hopeless without her and she is still in everyone's heart.
Bakhtawar is the second amongst Benazir's children after 20 years old Bilawal.
she has been taking interest in music from early days.

it is said that before her mothers return to the country with reference to a journalist friend she has expressed a will to meet the Grammy award winner music director and rapper Puff DD. but this meeting could not take place.
translation of Bakhtawar's poetry was published by some Sindhi news papers as well but her voice is being heard for the first time through You Tube.
some workers and followers of Benazir Bhutto have started preparing CDs of Bakhtawar's rap song.
on the other hand, the spokesman of Pakistan Peoples Party, Farhatullah Babar has confirmed that the poetry and voice in the song on Youtube is of Bakhtawar.
he told over the phone from Islamabad that its a tribute by a saddened daughter to her brave mother, and it is also being telecast by the government TV network as well.
Farhatullah Babar has said that his party has not decided yet to distribute the CD's of the song by Bakhtawar.
He said that few years back a fake account of his young Chairman Bilawal Bhutto Zardari was made on Facebook which was closed later on.

hl.seg: Ajmal Qasab is a Pakistani : Information Minister

doc.seg: Federal Minister for Information and broadcasting Sherry Rehman while confirming, through and SMS sent to BBC, the citizenship of Ajmal Qasab just added that further investigation is being carried out.
before this the Advisor to Prime Minister for Interior Rehman Malik had denied his Pakistani citizenship.
he had said that no record for Ajmal was found by the citizen record keeping institute, NADRA.
there is no information on this latest statement that on what basis the Government has changed its stance on Ajmal Qasab's citizenship.
However, according to the foreign office spokesman, Ajmal Qasab's citizenship has been confirmed by the interior ministry.
earlier BBC Urdu service and some other newspapers and TV channels have told that Ajmal Qassab belongs to Farid Kot town of the Okara District in Province Punjab.
however the government had been denying it.
it has not yet been established that this Ajmal Qassab does belong to Farid Kot or some other place.

hl.seg: Rocket Fire from Lebanon too, and bombing in response.

doc.seg: Israeli Army and Police officials have informed the press that four rockets were launched from Lebanon on to Israeli land, one of which hit the Northern part of Israel in Naharia, which injured two people.
In response to the rockets launched from Lebanon, Israeli tanks bombed Lebanon.
It's not certain that this attack was Hezbollah related or if aggravated Palestinian terrorists are behind this.
The Lebanese government has said that they are also trying to investigate who is behind these rocket attacks.
The reporters of BBC have declared this an entirely volatile and dangerous situation.
According to the Head of the Middle East sector of BBC, Jeremy Button, these rocket attacks have increased the chances of spreading the war.
In the past few days, it is feared that the Investigation in Gaza might reach to the Northern part of Lebanon and to the Israeli border.
Israeli forces have executed around 60 aerial attacks on the Gaza strip between Wednesday and Thursday night.
According to the Israeli army, the Hamas Police offices, tunnels, weapon stores, rocket launching areas and armed individuals were targeted in these attacks.
Aside from Aerial attacks, Gaza was also bombed all night from the Israeli and Bahria tank bases.
Palestinian sources say that a mosque was destroyed in these aerial attacks on Gaza.
According to some unverified sources, Israeli tanks are closing in on the area of Khan Younis with aerial help from helicopters.
In the last twelve days, around 700 Palestinians have been killed, a majority of which have been women and children.
On the other hand, 11 Israeli soldiers have also lost their lives.
Israeli Security Forces have confirmed that a high ranked officer, Amos Gailad, has left for Cairo to discuss conditions of a ceasefire.
A member of Hamas is also leaving to Cairo to have talks with the Egyptian Ambassador.
Also, a member of the Palestinian authority, Mahmood Abbas, will be reaching Cairo on Friday.

hl.seg: My heart is broken, give me back my kidney.

doc.seg: Dr. Richard Batista has said that eight years ago, he gifted his wife Danelle with his kidney to save her life.
According to some press reports, Dr. Batista has said that his wife repaid him for his gift by betraying him, having relations with someone else, and petitioning for divorce.
In an interview with a local paper, Dr. Batista said that this situation has left him with a hole in his heart.
According to Dr. Richard Batista's lawyer, he is asking for his kidney back, but in reality is looking for monetary compensation for his kidney.
According to his wife, they will be appearing before a judge in this matter, in the next few days.

hl.seg: 140 year old, 9 kilo lobster Freed.

doc.seg: ""George the Giant Lobster"" was caught in the sea two weeks earlier.
A seafood company of the city had bought him for 100 dollars.
And immediately starting using the lobster as means of their advertisement.
But a group for animal rights, ""Pita"", demanded the lobster's release and now he has been released in the sea again.
George was caught in a sea in Canada, after which he spent ten days in the tank of ""City Crab and Seafood Company.""
The age of a lobster can usually be determined by its weight.
According to the restaurant manager, Keith Wallanty, they did not mean any harm to the lobster, and put him in the tank only to arouse curiosity amongst their customers.
According to a member of Pita, Ingrid Newkirk, the decision of the restaurant is admirable and is an example to those who only want to keep the animal in a tank or boil them and eat them.

hl.seg: Search of girl with the help of a cell phone.

doc.seg: When the officials heard of Nataly Maltais, the police and firefighting forces of the city of Acton, Massachusetts came in to action.
Officials discovered the right location of the girl using the GPS on her cell phone.
Although with the google street view , it was found out that the girl is in a motel.
a week ago Natalie's grandmother Rose Maltois Natalie took her from her legal parents' custody.
Ethol's police chief Timothy Anderson told BBC that she said she would never give Natalie back and then she left the state.
Police contacted Miss Maltois but when as per promise she did not send Natalie back, the Police decided to search for Natalie through her cell phone.
since 2005 there is a regulation in America that the cellular companies will provide location for 67 percent people in a range of 100 meters and 95 percent callers in a range of 300 meters.

hl.seg: Hamid Karzai on a visit to India.

doc.seg: this is Hamid Karzai's second Indian tour in last five months.
it is expected that during his meeting with Prime minister Manmohan Singh he will discuss after effects of the terrorist attacks in Mumbai.
during this visit he wants to express the feeling of his people and solidarity with India over the Mumbai terrorists attacks.
during Karzai's visit, besides extremism, bilateral trade will also be discussed.
discussion on bilateral cooperation to counter extremism between both countries is also expected.
during his last visit to India, president Hamid Karzai said that terrorism will not be let into the relations between India and Afghanistan.
he also said that both India and Afghanistan are facing challenges of terrorism and merciless killings.
peace and stability in both countries, region and whole world is beneficial for everyone.
we understand this reality that both countries and the whole world can only join hands to face this curse of terrorism.
Ajmal Kasab is under the custody of Police. It is expected that police will submit the charge sheet against him before 24th Jan.
Ajmal kasam does not have a lawyer to defend him in the court.
Ajmal kasab has written to Govt. of Pakistan for Legal aid.
Pakistani extremists are responsible for mumbai attacks. India has provided the proofs to Pakistan.
Pakistan has accepted Ajmal Kasab as its citizen.

According to police, Ajmal and his companion Abu ismail were run away after killing TS chief karkaray, addition police chief Ashok kumar and other police officers. Ajmal and his fellow terrorists used the squad car of police officer. They were caught later near gargam chopati.
Ismail khan was killed and Ajmal was captured by Police.
No advocate has been assigned to assist Ajmal.
Govt appointed Danish Mota as lawyer for Ajmal Kasab but Mota refused to take this case. According to him it is immoral to defend Ajmal.
Two other lawyers also refuse to defend Ajmal after the protest of some political parties.

hl.seg: Legal committee formed.

doc.seg: On Tuesday, here in Islamabad he was addressing a seminar on environmental changes. after the his address he told the media that a meeting of parliamentary party will be called to decide the formation of this committee.
He said that MQM had presented the bill to dissolve 17th amendment. Others parties are planning to present their bills.
He told, 'to remove 17th amendment PPP has sent a legal document to all political parties.'
answering a question he told that balance of powers between PM and president would be decided by Parliament.
Prime minister said that Parliament is sovereign to make decisions.

while answering another question he said that Benazir along with other political forces had also played a role in forcing Musharraf to step down as Army chief. She convinced the International community about Gen. Musharraf's shedding of military uniform.
He said that vice president of America Joseph Byden are supporter of democracy in Pakistan. That is why he is awarded sitars imtiaz.
When asked about the Indian threat to cut off any relations with Pakistan, PM said that this statement was given under the intense public pressure.

hl.seg: Protest against the removal of journalists

doc.seg: Many of print and electronic media journalists held protest demonstration under the backing of RIUJ against the downsizing in different media organizations. They were shouting slogans against media owners and government

CR Shamsi, a senior member RIUJ, addressed the gathering. He said the same politicians who were protesting on roads with us, now are ruling this country. They have not enough courage to take actions against some power media owners
He said how the owners of media groups talked about human rights; they are exploiting the poor journalists by killing them financially.

One example of the exploitation is the suicide of a reporter of Lahore based Private TV channel. He was not having his due salary for four months. The media workers are living hand to mouth under the constant stress of downsizing and under payment.
He supported a decisive action against media owners. A camp should be installed before the National assembly to show anger and protest.
CR Shamsi criticized Salman taseer and blamed that Govers newspaper aaj Kaal is sacking its employees without any prior notice.
Daily Jinnah, daily khabrain, Channel 5, business plus and Aaj news have sacked dozens of their employees.

Mazhar Abbas, General Secretary RIUJ, also addressed. He said that all journalists associations are observing black day today to protest anganist forced abdications of journalists. He said that journalists will cover the parliaments session with black strips to protest.
Mazhar Abbas said that 50% TV channels and newspapers of Pakistan are exploiting media workers. Journalists are working there without any formal agreement
He said that more than 200 journalists and media workers are being sacked from TV channels and newspapers. More workers can be sacked by using economic crisis as a possible reason.

Mazhar Abbas has said that the journalists' movement will continue unless, the dismissed workers are restored, implementation of the seventh wage board responsible of determining the wages of employees of news papers and release of salaries of TV channels and newspaper employees' blocked since many months.

hl.seg: cabinet of eleven members have taken oath.

doc.seg: new cabinet includes six ministers from anti, ex prime minister Sardar Atiq Ahmed Khan, Muslim conference group, two from Pakistan Peoples Party, two from Peoples Muslim Conference and two from the Mutahida Qaumi Movement.
the eleven members cabinet also includes a female member as well who belongs to the anti Atiq Muslim Conference group.

the ruling coalition has said that an expansion will be made in the cabinet next week, and it is expected that a dozen more ministers will be added to the cabinet. note that earlier this month Sardar Atiq Khan was dismissed from the prime ministry through vote of no confidence and Sardar Yaqoob was elected as the new prime minister.
the departments of these ministers will be announced later on.
during the oath taking ceremony, the workers of Pakistan Peoples Party raised slogans in favor of ex prime minister Benazir Bhutto.

hl.seg: 3.5 million users effected from the virus.

doc.seg: discovered for the first time in October 2008, this virus known by the names like Confecker, Down and Up and Kido.
Microsoft had released a patch to tackle with this virus but despite of that almost 3.5 million computer and memory sticks have been affected with it.
the experts say that the number of effected computers can be a lot more.
to handle this, the users need to use Microsoft's MS08067 patch.
according to Microsoft, this virus which infected millions of computers, locates the services.exe file in windows and then enter gets into its code.
afterwards, this virus turns into a DLL type of file into the System folder of the windows.
it also creates the name of this file as well.
then changes the registry details of the windows.
after getting activated, this virus creates a problem which rises as an http server and changes the restore point of the system.
afterwards, it downloads the files from the maker's website.
according to Microsoft, this virus has infected computers in different countries of the world.
these countries include China, Brazil, Russia, India, America and Britain.

hl.seg: Delivery of The Indian Information.

doc.seg: After the meeting, the Interior Ministry talked to the representatives of media on Saturday about India.
The issue of help for the investigation.
He said that Pakistan is an independent country from India, and is not receiving any information by the investigation of the country.
Daily calls will not be accepted.
He said that in addition to the information recieved, other informations are also given by India.
The interior minister said that atleast 124 members of the Peace team are feared to have been arrested under the law-enforcing the banned organization.
And if there is nothing against some people, then the evidence of action against the innocent people will be released.
In response to a question, he said that a person was arrested in connection with India and action will be taken according to the Pakistani laws.
He said that the action will be taken against the people of FIA under the law.

while answering a question he said that the Indian law enforcement agencies have collected information about people involved in Mumbai attacks in 42 days therefore the world community including India will give some time to Pakistan to investigate on these informations.
He reiterated this offer from the government that a joint investigation team be made to investigate the Mumbai attacks.
it should be clear that a 3 membered investigation team led by additional director general FIA which is of Mumbai attacks from India.
investigating on informations provided to Pakistan.

Pakistani High commissioner in India Shahid Malik has met president Asif Ali Zardari in which it was cleared that if any person or group from Pakistan is found involved in Mumbai attacks, he will be dealt in accordance with the national laws and no one will be handed over to India. whereas the Indian leadership is putting pressure on Pakistan to extradite the people involved in the incident to India.

hl.seg: 'Any thing is possible in America'

doc.seg: Mr. Obama will take oath as the 44th president of America on 20th January.
while standing on the stairs of the building built in memory of 16th American president Abraham Lincoln and addressing a musical concert
Mr. Obama said that America is facing the most bitter challenges since many generations and he is hopeful that America will take care of it.
Abraham Lincoln put an end to slavery in America.
But at the same time Mr. Obama said that it will take time to solve problems that are facing the country and it is a tough road.
But nevertheless, I am hopeful that the dream of the founders of this country will live.
America, besides the wars of Iraq and Afghanistan, is fighting a great economic downfall.
Unusual steps are being taken for the ceremony of the oath taking.
Management thinks that 2 million people will attend this ceremony.
America has a public holiday on Monday as on this same day the great leader of human rights Martin Luther King was assassinated.
Martin Luther King was black.

hl.seg: A tribute to Martin Luther King, The decision of doing work.

doc.seg: Dr. Martin Luther King was murdered in 1968.
Barrack Obama paid tribute to Dr. Martin Luther King and told Americans to work together to fulfill the promises of this nation.
In Washington preparations are taking place for the arrangements of unprecedented gathering of people for the new President oath ceremony on Tuesday.
Almost two million people are expected to gather to see this historical President Oath.
Barack Obama has started Monday by visiting a medical center in Northern Washington where he met wounded American soldiers afterwards he went to a shelter for homeless and painted a wall.
Talking to correspondents Barack Obama said: The current crisis we are having and the problems many people are facing,in this situation we can't sit and relax.
He said that Martin Luther King has spent his life in serving people.
Barack Obama said that today when we are remembering him, this is not the day to stay and think. It is the day to act.
He said that Tuesday's ceremony will be held on the same place where thousands of people gathered for Martin Luther King's 'I have a dream' in 1963.
In this speech Martin Luther King said that the day will come when people will not be differentiated on the base of their color.
Mathew Price of BBC says that it is the tragedy of history that the day of Martin Luther is 24 hours earlier then the day when first black President of America will sworn in.
For many in southern states of America the Presidency of Barack Obama, will be the interpretation of Martin Luther King's dream.

hl.seg: Additional Political has been freed.

doc.seg: 10 days ago, Additional political Agent was kidnapped by some unknown kidnappers in south Wazirisatan
Sources claim that Mulla Nazir group of local Taliban is responsible for the kidnapping of agent.
According to local administration, Political Agent, Aamir Latif was handed over to scout camp by the tribal jirga.
It was not disclosed who was responsible for kidnapping the political agent.
However, people of local tribes claim Mulla Nazir group of Taliban were responsible for kidnapping the Political agent.
Aamir Latif was kidnapped when he was traveling form wana to Tonk.
On 11th January 2009, Additional Political agent Aamir Latif and his driver were kidnapped by 7 veiled gun men in the tribal area of South Waziristan.
According Govt. officials, kidnappers first disarmed the security guards of the political agents and then take him away from there.

According to Local administration, all the check posts in the area have been strengthened with more security forces. Travelers are scrutinized thoroughly. An economic sanction has been imposed on Wana for last week.

on 8th of December 2008, Assistant political agent of north Wazirastan Asmatullah got kidnapped when he was going from Mir Ali to Bannu to enjoy his Eid vacations. Few days after this two people including Tehsildar Amanullah were killed by unknown maskers in north Wazirastan.

hl.seg: Victory of a British hacker in the court.

doc.seg: a 42 years old British citizen has admitted that he had hacked an American military website.
Gary is a patient of asperger syndrome. it should be kept in mind that an asperger syndrome patient has the obsession to do similar kind of tasks.
his lawyers say that if he is handed over to America then he will commit suicide.
however the government officials say that their are very less threat regarding Gary's health.
Lord justice Morskey and Mr. Justice Simon while announcing the decision said that Gary is permitted to file a review petition in a British court.
He added that the secretary of interior has noticed this issue.
but the government prosecutors say that the secretary of interior had used his authority.
Gary has never denied hacking of the American military website.
in 2001 and 2002, Gary hacked American computer system which caused a loss of eight hundred thousand dollars to the American government.
Gary hacked 97 computers including that of American Navy and NASA.
However Gary says that he did not do dis with bad intentions but he was just looking for information about aliens which he thought the American government had kept secret.
Gary's mother Janice Sharp has said that she is happy with this decision.
Gary's lawyer has said that its the right decision.
This case has been continued since 2002 and finally a right decision has come up.

hl.seg: Kashmir: two Hizb Commanders killed.

doc.seg: Colonel Acharya, spokesman of the northern command of the Indian Army deployed in Jammu, told BBC: on a reliable information, troops from 24 rashtria rifles and Jammu Kashmir police besieged the place in batihaas jungle in tehsil Gandwa of the Doda district where the armed extremists were hiding.
they fired at the army and in retaliation two extremists got killed.

Correspondent say that among the two terrorists killed, one was also Zahoorudding, the district commander of the banned group Hizb-ul-Mujahideen active for the last 12 years in the area, who was a specialists in bomb blasts.
The other with him is identified as Sajjad Hussain, who according to the army , became associated to the extremists since the last year.

According to Acharia, the operation is still going on in the mentioned area of the jungle because according to them there is a possibility of presence of more extremists there. Army said two Kalashnikov were found during the first step of the operation.
Yesterday, the head of the province police, Kuldeep Kumar Khudda, by announcing the statistics of the year 2008, has declared this year the most peaceful year until now.
It is worth mentioning that in November and December during 7 stages of assembly elections, no torture was done.
More than 1350 candidates participated in these elections.
Be clear that Hizb-ul-Mujahideen is active in Jammu Kashmir for the last eight years.
Hizb-ul-Mujahideen declared one sided cease fire in July 2000 for the first time after which Indian government and Hizb commandos had a talk.
But the cease fire was over in only 15 days.
Later many senior commandos of Hizb-ul-Mujahideen were killed in different operations.

on Thursday, the Pakistan's famous daily The News has said regarding the extremist groups existing in the Pakistani administered Kashmir, that Lashkare Taiba and Hizbul Mujahidin have decided to review the Kashmir policy.
it should be clear that both the organizations had a policy that the Kashmir dispute should be resolved through an armed resistance.

hl.seg: Dera Bugti: blast over the gas pipeline

doc.seg: Police officials say that the 18 inches diameter pipeline going from Lui gas field to peer koh was blasted.
this pipeline goes towards the Sui plant.
meanwhile, Sarbaz Baloch, presenting himself as a representative of the banned Baloch republican army has accepted the responsibility of the blast on behalf of his organization over the telephone.
fourth pipeline has been blasted in four days.
on Friday an 18 inches diameter pipeline was blasted in Dera Allahyar whose repair work was continued till Sunday morning.
General Manager of Sui Southern Gas in Quetta, Mushtaq Siddiqui has told that supply from this pipeline will resume in the afternoon.
this pipeline reached Quetta through Sibbi.

there is a severe shortage of gas in Quetta, Ziarat and other surrounding areas for the past three days, where on one hand snowfall is continuing and temperature has fallen below the freezing point and on the other hand heaters and stoves are out of gas.
moreover in Dera Bugti city, there was a motorcycle blast on the mall road but police told that there was no loss of lives in this blast.

hl.seg: Adminstrator for Jamaat Al-Dawa.

doc.seg: The central headquarter of Jamaat Al dawa is in Muridkay almost 25 Kilometers away from Lahore.
the center includes hospital, schools and student hostels.
Law minister for Punjab, Rana Sanaullah has said that the posting of administrator in Jammat al Dawa center is to make sure that the social work being done over there is not affected.

the leader of Jamaat al Dawa Hafiz Saeed's son in law Khalid Waheed has told that for the supervision of the hospitals, schools and other welfare organizations a high government official has been appointed and according to him the number of police troops have also been increased.

the Security counsel of the United Nations have imposed sanctions on Jamaat al Dawa after which the Federal government of Pakistan have stared an operation across the country against Jamaat al Dawa and have put leaders including the leader of the Jamaat Hafiz Saeed in House-Arrest.
Khaqan Babar belongs to the DMG or District Management Group.

Hafiz Khalid Waheed has told that on Sunday the Commissioner of Lahore Khusro Pervez Khan along with police and civil administration came to the Taiba Center and inspected its different parts. Khalid Waheed has disapproved the appointment of the administrator in the center of Jamaat al Dawa and said that due to the actions of the government, the number of patients in the hospitals and children in the schools of the center have already decreased.

Here according to a press release by Jamat-ud-Dawa, party's chief Hafiz Saeed has written a letter for the General Secretary of United Nations, Ban Ki Mon, and Committee for Taliban, in a reques is made to cancel the restrictions on the party made by the Security Council.

It says in the letter that the one sided decision of the Security Council on banning Jamat-ud-Dawa is unfair. And Jamat-ud-Dawa has no relation with terrorism but it is busy in the activities of charity.

hl.seg: Edhi on the aid mission of Gaza.

doc.seg: After going through many steps of receiving permission required to enter Gaza, he has only been successful in reaching Egypt from New york.
He said while talking to BBC Urdu service from Qahira that he has still not reached Gaza because Egypt and Israel has created many obstacles.
He said that it has been 8 days since I am here but I still have not received the permission to enter Gaza.
"I am currently in Qahira and hopefully will get permission to go to Gaza

He told explaining that: "First I was given only 7 days visa to go to Gaza and later on my insisting, Pakistani officials helped me and had it extended for one month but on this condition that I will go to Gaza only once that is single entry.
He said that he has his son and daughters with him and they want to do charity work in Gaza.
I have brought some money.
A one million dollar check has been given to Red cross of Egypt and ten thousand dollar cash is also given in order to send aid to Gaza.

hl.seg: four more ministers in the cabinet, total of sixty three

doc.seg: four new federal ministers include two from Mutahida Qaumi Movement and Two from Jamiat Ulamae Islam Fazalur Rehman Group.
president Asif Ali Zardari took oath from the new ministers.
in the oath taking ceremony, the Prime Minister Yousuf Raza Gilani and members of cabinet were also present.
after the inclusion of four new ministers to the federal cabinet, the number of Federal ministers, ministers for state and advisors has reached a total of sixty three.
two minister from MQM include Farooq Sattar and Babar Ghouri whereas ministers from Jamiat Ulamae Islam Fazalur Rehman Group include Azam Swati and Molana Ataur Rehman.
the departments of these ministers have not been announced yet.
Farooq sattar is the convener of MQM whereas Babar Ghouri is a senator from MQM whose term wil expire on tenth March.
Azam Swati was elected as a free senator and is considered to be one of the richest senators.
Moulana Ata-ur-Rahman is a member of National Assembly and also Moulana Fazal-ur-Rahman's younger brother.
Remember that, four statesmen holding posts in important ministries are not the members of the national assembly.

Note that the cabinet was expanded on 3rd November, 2008 with 22 new ministers and 18 national ministries. So, at that time it was thought that the members of MQM would also be included but due to disagreements on the distribution of the ministries, MQM stayed away.

hl.seg: Bolochistan, Blasted Pipeline

doc.seg: According to police, this is a 18 inch diameter pipeline which connects different wells of Parekoh and meets Suyi gas pipeline. This was blasted my some unidentified men in early morning.
Apart from this, yesterday, well number 3 near Suyi had been totally destroyed by a blast and also a gas pipeline near Dera-allayar was also damaged due to a blast.
Militant organization Baloch republican army's spokeperson, Saryaz Baluch accepted the responsibility of these blast on the behalf of his organization.
As the year 2009 started, the was increase in violent incidents in Baluchistan.
This month, till now, several gas pipelines have been blasted. Also, Attacks on trains and on people belonging to the Punjab region have also increased.

Though the Prime Minister of Baluchistan, Nawab Aslam Rayisani, has expressed concern over such activities and ordered the police to exchange information from intelligence agencies, but,stopping such incidents has not been possible yet.

hl.seg: Approval of package of 819 billion dollars for economic revival.

doc.seg: No member related to the Republican party did not vote in favor of this plan of President Obama.
Members of the republican party said that the economic plan is very expensive and will not prove effective.
240 votes were drawn in favor of this package in the members assembly where as 160 were drawn against it.
This plan of economic revival will be presented next week in the Senate where the ruling Democratic party has very little majority.
Danger is being expressed that great opposition from the republican party may not make it easy for Senate approval.
After the approval of economic revival plan from the members assembly, Barrack Obama insisted on the members that this important plan should not come between the political disagreement.
President said that this plan, for which he was hopeful that it will act as the law by next month, will prove to make a peaceful atmosphere in the country. Due to which trade will enhance in America.

According to this plan, common people and business men will be relieved of loan from 275 billion dollars and 540 billion dollars will be given for roads, bridges, 10,000 schools, unemployment allowance and research for new technology.

BBC writer Richard Luster has said in Washington that Barrack Obama intended to introduce a new political culture by putting back the political disagreements but discussion this Economic Package has once again made political pillars sore.
Republican party members in the assembly declared the bill proposed from the government, a waste of government money. And said that this will not help in creating new vacancies.
They insisted on the bill proposed by their party in which attention has been given to relaxation in taxes.
They said that through their package, less investment can create more chances of livelihood.
They said that instead of construction plans, relaxation in taxes can create more number of vacancies instantly.

hl.seg: Bitterness among Israeli president and Turkish Prime Minister

doc.seg: Rajab Tayyab Erdogan almost shouted at Israeli President and said that many people's blood have been shed in Gaza. And he felt sorrow watching that people can actually clap on the reason of this military action from Israel.
Mr. Erdogan said that "I think you are using such words to erase your guilt and that in a high voice. But you killed people and I am remembering those children who were killed near the shore"
Shamoon Parez said that Gaza's pain is not Israel, It is Hammas who has founded dangerous dictatorship there.
A correspondent of BBC from Davis says that nothing like this has been seen before in an international economic forum.
Although later Erdogan said that he respects the Israeli president and also his age due to which he did not shout at him but what he was saying was miles away from truth.
Turkey is one of few Muslim countries which has diplomatic ties with Israel but for there is an acrimony in the relations of both the countries for last few years.

hl.seg: ""Attacks were not planned in Pakistan""

doc.seg: Wajid Shams ul Hassan while talking to Indian channel 'NDTV' said that the Pakistani investigations report about Mumbai attacks will be released soon.
More than 170 people were killed in last November's Mumbai attacks.
According to India extremist organization Lashkre Taiba is responsible for the attacks.
India also said that 'state elements' of Pakistan were involved in Mumbai attacks.
The mutual relations of the two countries are affected.
High Commissioner Wajid Shams ul Hassan delivered his first statement about Pakistani investigations which shows, what could be in the investigations report.
Wajid Shams ul Hassan said: As for as the result of investigators, Pakistani soil was not used.
It can be any other place, not also England.
these are the two places (Pakistan and Britain) about which I was worried.
India and the international community has created a lot of pressure on Pakistan to take actions against the culprits of the Mumbai attacks.
Wajid Shamsul Haq said: we are not trying to cover it up.
we believe in taking action based on facts.
the world will accept our investigations.
we will try to satisfy India over the results (of the investigation)
while defending the delay in the investigation is Pakistan he said that it takes time to collect, understand and check these kind of stuffs.
The High Commissioner Wajid Shamsul Haq said that it took 45 days for India to present its dossier.

hl.seg: A black man elected as the republican leader too.

doc.seg: in the sixth round of elections in the Republican party, Michael steel has won who received 91 votes out of 168.

During the election for the position of chairman of the party, Katen Dawsen, candidate opposite to Steel, was given 70 votes. Whereas, former chairman Dunken abdicated from the competition in the second round.
People say that from the five candidates who stood for the position of the chairmanship of the republican party, Michael Steel was considered the most conservative among them.

After his win, Michael Steel said in his speech "We are saying to our friends and enemies together, that come with us but those who will cause problems in this, be prepared to separate from us." Michael Steel is from Maryland where he has also been the Deputy governor.
He got famous in 2006 when he stood for a seat in the senate.
But after loosing in the senate elections he was appointed as the chairman of one political conservative committee of the party.
Now after being selected as the chairman of the party, the efforts of the republican party campaign in the entire country will be under his supervision.
He fought elections for this promise that he will give the party a new cause. And that he will use a new technique to join conservative supporters to the party.

hl.seg: Indian claims presence of Lashker-e-Tayyaba and Josh-e-Muhammad in Jammu.

doc.seg: There are news of presence of terrorists in the Poonch Tribal area of Jammu
According to the official sources, police and army surrounded the area and started the search on receiving secret information.
During this a fight started in which four militants, two soldiers and one policeman were killed.

According to the sources, fights were going on until the last news. And in this area, militants associated with Lashker-e-Tayyaba and Josh-e-Muhammad are present, for which more army has been sent to fight them.

During this, chief minister, nominated by the involved officials, Omer Abdullah met with the governor and he directly gave the news of the selection of the Assembly leader from his party national conference.
Congress, the ally of the National conference also informed the governor of the advocacy of Omar Abdullah.
Omar Abdullah will take oath as the chief minister of teh sate.
Remember, national conference became the biggest party by gaining 28 seats in the assembly of 87 members in the current state elections. Keep in mind that separatist parties boycotted the elections.
Congress, which secured 17 seats, accepted to form coailition government with the national conference.
Today party workers welcomed Omar Abdullah with great fanfare on his arrival in Srinagar.

On this occasion, Omar Abdullah says that he will play his role in making the talks possible between Indian government and separatists. Although this is not possible until the elections in India and formation of the new government.

hl.seg: The Role of EU for peace in the Middle east.

doc.seg: from official point of view, the role of European Union is decisive in the peace efforts to stop the war in the Middle East.
according to Brussels' official stance, the efforts of Schwarzenberg delegation or Sarkozy were equally helpful in this regard.
European Union's spokesman Amadeu Altafaj has said that every such effort is adorable which is helpful in sending the European Union's message to the opponents of the war.
it seems alright as far as the official statement is concerned.
but in reality the European Union is portraying a very disappointing picture of the internal tensions.
as the head of the Union, Czech republic's role is even weaker than before.
an on top of that the internal issues have made is helpless.
on the other hand the French president Sarkozy is behaving like if he is still the president of the European Union.
Whereas France has completed its presidential tenure of six months.
Sarkozy wants to play a leading role and he is capable of it but he does not have the permission to do it.
the most funny situation is faced by the French foreign minister Bernard Kouchner.
he is part of a delegation which is headed by the foreign minister of Czech republic Schwarzenberg.
the problem is that both foreign ministers are issuing contradictory statements over the Middle East war.

Schwarzenberg says that Israel has the right for self defense whereas Kouchner says that this cannot be considered as a war for self defense. moreover Germany has sent its special ambassador to Middle East. Unless the European Union does not show unity based on common stance, it can not succeed on the diplomatic front.
its proof is the Israeli behavior which does not care about the efforts for reconciliation from the European Union.
this is a golden chance for the European Union to do something since America due to the policies of George W. Bush has already failed in the Middle East.

hl.seg: Financial Crisis: Suicide of a billionaire German industrialist.

doc.seg: Adolf Merckle, a resident of Sawabia in Southern Germany left a huge business group behind him.
but a short while ago, common German citizens did not know much about it.
when he had to negotiate with 30 banks who lent money to his industrial group, he became the topic of the headlines and he could foresee the murky future of the Merckle group.
Marclay Group had to bear the loss of hundreds of million euros after it bought the shares of one of known industry Folks Wigan.
then the financial institutes rejected to provide the much needed 100 Million and 1 billion euros to this group and this exerted severe pressure on Marclay.

Recently the same banks accepted to provide loan to Marclay group on urgent basis but Adolf Marclay who started as a small industrialist to reach a place where his industrial group's annual income reached 30 billion euros, couldn't bear the the loss in his financial strength.
After the death of his father when Adolf Marclay took the responsibility of the business he used modern methods and made the business more successful.
He named his company Ratiopharm which is now Germany's most successful and biggest pharmaceutical company.

Till recent times this phamasutical company had a budget of around 5 to 6 billion euros and even now it is earning around 8 billion euros annually. After the great success of Rasue farm the Marclay Group bought many big industries like Hi-Del Barag Cement a manufacture of construction equipment. Kassbohrer and other good car maker
Marclay Group has a employee number of around 100 thousand around the world and among its industries, Rasue Farm has always been given special importance.
Adolf Marclay has said this many times in his life. ""We have been in pharma business since four generations"".
Now the industry is handled by the children and i hope that it continues to work for few hundred years by our family.

After the suicide of Adolf Marclay,the banks have given approval of temporary loan of 400 million euro for his group VEM but on this condition that VEM have to be sold to Rasio Farm so that the financial position of this group is improved on long term basis.
Like this, after the death of Adolf Meerklay, the Meerklay group will not remain the same as it was.

hl.seg: Crime rate among the immigrants in Germany.

doc.seg: According to the fresh statistics, crime rate among the immigrants from 2004 to 2007 is
Reduced from 9.22%
According to Joachim Herrmann, the interior minister of Baweria province, this is apparently a positive change.
He said: "It is important to note that the number of foreigners getting German citizenship is increasing.
Therefore this should also be mentioned in the statistics that even though the criminal is German but his background is foreign.
Herrmann said that his province will take this in to account when gathering statistics in 2010.
Besides Baweria, Hamburg is also thinking in the same lines.

Senator for foreign affairs from CDU, Christoph Ahlhaus has said: "When research is done in a scientific manner, the man can not pre-decide its results but it is based on the facts and figures that come out as a result of the research.

Ahlhaus diverted the attention to a research report from the anti crime's provincial office which was prepared in 2006 and according to this report in Bergdorf, a part of Hamberg, it was investigated that out of all crimes happening there what percentage have the involvement of foreigners.
results showed that the foreigners here have
the crime rate was less as compared to the crimes allover the province.
in contrast when in 2006 a survey was done on crimes in youth in Berlin, it came up that young people having foreign background had a percentage of .44
was 7 percent

However, other political parties of Germany for example, SPD, Environmentalists organization Greens, and leftist organization Linkspartei were against this proposal that while collecting facts and figures regarding crimes, this should also be inquired that which German citizen has a foreign background.

hl.seg: We want quick evacuation of troops from Gaza: Olmert

doc.seg: Ehud Olmert has stressed that for complete evacuation of the army, a future and permanent ceasefire agreement is inevitable.
Hamas and Israel declared ceasefire on Sunday.
Islamic militant group Hammas while announcing one week cease fire, has asked the Israel army to leave the Gaza strip within one week and to finish the barricade on the Gaza strip.
On other side, the leader of Hammas Ismail Hannan has said that Israel has been given victory from God in the Gaza war.
He said that in Gaza war, Israel has not been able to succeed to achieve its purpose.
Before that, in the city of Egypt, Sharm Al Sheikh, a conference was held of Arab and European countries on Sunday. In which Israel was asked to evacuate its army from Gaza instantly.
It was decided in the conference that soon an international aid conference will be held for Gaza.
German chancellor Angela Meerkal also attended the mentioned conference.
At least 1300 Palestinians and including 10 soldiers, a total of 13 Israelis were killed in the war lasting for three weeks between the militants of Hammas and Israel.
On the other side, Palestinian President Mahmood Abbas has insisted on the formation of national government in the areas of Palestine.

hl.seg: A video message for Germany from Al-Qaeda

doc.seg: In this 30 minute video message, a man wearing a black turban with a covered face and holding a gun, is giving a message to the German Government.
This man is introducing himself as Abu Talha and speaking in German language.
Arabic sub-titles of this video message are also there.
on the side of the screen is the logo of Al-Qaida and the date written in the video is October 2008.

in this message it is said to the German government that after deploying such a large number of troops in Afghanistan this country is thinking that it will not be attacked, if it's not ingeniousness then what else?
introducing himself as Abu Talha, this man however did not threaten to directly attack Germany.
the number of German troops amongst the Allied NATO forces in Afghanistan is around 3500.
last year the German parliament has approved a bill to send one thousand more troops to Afghanistan.
this is the first message to Germany from Al-Qaida.

having a critical eye on terrorism related issues, the famous expert Mikhail Luders says regarding this message: "the recent suicide attack on the German embassy in Kabul is a proof of the fact that we should take it seriously in any case.
for the past few years Al-Qaida has been issuing video messages on internet and there have been attacks as well after such messages.
The responsibility for the terrorist attack outside the German Embassy at the weekend was taken by the militant group, the Taliban.
Most German papers and analyzers are linking this attack with the message of Al Qaeda.
"They are targeting Germany.
Muslim hard liners see the Germans Afghan policy in a negative and questionable light.
They blame the German government of adopting biased policies not just towards Afghanistan but the Middle East also.
And it is for this reason that they are increasingly finding Germany as their enemy.
Besides this the German Government stated that even before the video came out publically the German undercover agencies knew about it.
The German federal anti crime organization was occupied in investigating the contents of the video.

hl.seg: Obama took office as the President of America.

in this reference, the German Chancellor Angela Merckle has expressed confidence in the American president.
"I am sure that based on the friendship between Federal Republic of Germany and the United States of America, we can resolve all the issues faced.
Russian prime minister Viladimir Putin has said that Obama appears to a serious and open hearted man this is really a good news.
although the policies of former American president George W. Bush have been facing criticism.

however, his regime is appreciated for promoting China to play a more constructive role internationally whereas China has said about the new American president that he will have to work for stronger military relations between both countries.
Active in German city of Bochum, Chinese political expert Kusuay Wu says:

"in this reference, I am sure that in coming weeks and months, Obama and his team of economists will put immense pressure on China to have a more flexible and competitive to market exchange rate for the Chinese currency.
former American regime has also improved on relations with India.

how far Obama can take these relations, Christopher Raj, Professor of American Studies in New Delhi says on this: "now we have come closer in strategic partnership, however, Obama can not bring an overnight change.

According to the Newspaper, Tony is on the quest to find a right solution to bring peace in Middle East. He criticized the Bush Administration's attitude of negligence towards Hamas. Western countries has realized the public and administrative power of Hamas. In past, Hamas was considered a Terroist organisation, a terrorist organisation which is struggling for the freedom of its homeland;immorally occupied by the Israel Govt.

hl.seg: Assassination of Baloch traders in Karachi, complete strike in Quetta.

doc.seg: Complete strike was observed in Quetta and some other areas against murder of four Baluchi traders in Karachi.
During this all the trade centers remained close traffic was also less then normal.

The protest was called by Baluchistan trades organization, Pakhtunkhah Milli Awami Party AND JUI who blamed that Karachi Police has allegedly killed them by firing when they reached their car showroom at Tariq Road.
Abdul Rahim Kakar President of Traders Organization has demanded that police officials involved in the incident should be arrested and punished.
However no instant statement of police has arrived.
The killed traders belonged to the city of Chaman.
Government arranged security vastly during strike and police was deployed at all the important places of the city.

hl.seg: Senior Hamas Commander died in Israeli attack

doc.seg: In an air strike of Israel a senior commander of Hamas has died.
It is the death of 2nd Hamas leader in Israel continual attack for a week in Gaza Strip.
Officials of Hammas have said that Abu Zakaria Al Jamal was killed on Saturday in his palace located in North of Gaza city.
Scholar Nazar Rayyan of Hammas was killed in another aerial attack by Israel on Thursday.
Residing in Rome, Hammas's exiled leader Khalid Mashal has expressed taking revenge and threatened Israel with a ground attack.
There are thousands of soldiers and tanks of Israel placed on the border of Gaza and they are waiting for fighting orders.
America has appealed for a cease fire. But has said that decision of fighting on Gaza is based on Israel.
American President George Bush, on his weekly radio speech, has accused Hammas of excitation to aggravate violence. And has adjudged their rocket attacks on Israel as terrorism.
He has said that America is working on cease fire. But one-way agreement will not be accepted.

hl.seg: Three dead bodies found in the Northern Waziristan.

doc.seg: Pakistani security officials have said that three dead bodies are found in the tribal areas of Northern Waziristan.
There is doubt that Taliban have killed them by giving them death sentence.
These dead bodies are found near the main city Meran Shah of northern Waziristan. And with them, such notes are found in which these men are blamed to be American spies.
Officials said that probably one of the bodies is of the man who was kidnapped last week.
He said that the other two bodies damaged with bullets are of Afghan inhabitants.

hl.seg: Israeli attacks on Gaza continue on the 10th day

doc.seg: A Palestinian child injured in the Israel missile attack. Israel ground army is fighting with the troops of Hammas in the entire area of Gaza strip where as Israeli aerial army continued attacks on the area's of militant groups on the 10th day.
The defense minister of Israel, Ehud Barack, said on Monday that they will continue the army operation until the people of Southern Israel are safe from the rocket attacks of Hammas.
Although, besides the attacks of Israel, the rocket firing is continued from the side of Hammas in which four people including three local citizens are killed.
Leader of Hammas, Mahmood Zuhr on monday insisted on his friends to demolish the Israeli Army and target local Israeli residents.
But one official of Hammas said that they plan to send a delegation to Egypt on Monday to think about the current violent situation of their party.

In Gaza one Palestinian woman injured. Medical sources in Gaza said that during the last 10 days almost 530 people have been killed and these also include those 11 civilians in which at least there were five children.
Israel, in a ground attack, has reported one soldier killed and 10 more injured.
Israel has stopped journalist, to do reporting on the military action, from entering Gaza.

hl.seg: the elected vice president of America, Joseph Biden has reached Pakistan.

doc.seg: the Foreign Minister welcomed the American Vice President.
the elected Vice President of America along with his delegates have reached Islamabad or Friday on a tour to Pakistan.
Foreign Minister Shah Mehmood Qureshi and higher officials of the American consulate welcome them.
American senator Lindsy Graham is also accompanying Biden in this visit.

Press officer of the American embassy Luo Fentern told voice of America that the elected vice president will discuss different regional issues with Pakistani officials but he restrained from giving more details.
sources from Foreign office say that apart from government officials, Joseph Biden will also meet the Chief of army staff General Ashfaq Pervez Kiani.
it is expected that apart from bilateral and global issues, war on terror related issues will also be discussed.
Joseph Biden was awarded Hilal-e-Pakistan.
After arriving in Islamabad, Joseph Biden met with President Asif Ali Zardari.
During the meeting the president presented him with Hilal-e-Pakistan on playing an important role in forming close relations between Pakistan and America.

Please have it cleared that last year Joseph Biden, together with Senator Richard Lugar, introduced a Bill as a chairman of Foreign Affair committee, favoring the increase in America's foreign army provision to Pakistan in the coming 5 years by 3% to a total of 5.7 billion dollars.

hl.seg: Joe Biden played an important role in removing the previous president Parvez Musharaf, Prime Minister Gilani

doc.seg: Yusuf Raza Gilani and Joe Biden ( File Photo)

Prime Minister Yusuf Raza Gilani has stated that America's Vice President candidate Joe Biden has played an important role in making Parvez Musharaf leave as Army Chief of Staff. And Joe Biden has also helped a lot for democracy in Pakistan.
Yusuf Raza Gilani made this statement during a talk with the press in Shipyard, Karachi.
He said that Joe Biden is Pro-Pakistan or supports Pakistan. And he, as a chairperson of Foreign Affair Committee of American Senate, presented a bill of 15 billion dollars aid for Pakistan.

On protesting against missile attacks done by American investigating jets, Prime Minister Pakistan said that Pakistan has no agreement with American government on permitting such attacks and according to him, this is a matter of Pakistan's despotism therefore they can not permit attacks of these kind on any condition in the country's premises.
he also expressed a hope that after the succession of the new American government, change will come to the American policy as well.
(File Photo)

Yusuf Raza Gilani has said that the government has successfully separated taliban from ordinary tribesmen but the drone attacks have proven to be very harmful to the efforts of the government and the terrorists once again join hands with the local tribes.
he said that the international community agrees to this stance of Pakistan.
Prime Minister added that if reliable evidence is provided, then the Pakistani Forces will operate itself in its own territory.

prime minister yusuf Raza Gilani repeated his stance over Mumbai attacks and said that if India provides evidence, then investigation will be carried out on its basis and if there is any proof of someone's involvement, he will be dealt according to the laws of the country.
while answering a question about Rehman Malik's tour to Britain and his meeting with the MQM leader Altaf Hussain, the Prime Minister said that Rehman Malik went to London on his approval.

hl.seg: Quetta, four policemen including DSP killed.

doc.seg: File Photo
on an important highway of Quetta, Saryab road, firing by unknown people killed four policemen including DSP 'Deputy Superintendent of Police".

On Wednesday morning in a jeep two DSP, a Sub-inspector and two constable of police training center was going on saryab road, near degree College on a motorcycle rider unknown attackers jeep police opened fire, sub-Inspector Mehdi and constable, were killed on the spot while one DSP Hasan Ali died after reaching the hospital died of severe injuries.
Hospital sources say that the severe injuries DSP Ghulam Mahmud critical condition and they also head bullets in his neck and began.
After the incident, police surrounded area so far in the responsibility of the incident will not accept any.

hl.seg: The death of another Indian software engineer in America

doc.seg: Another software engineer belonging to Andhra Pradesh has been shot and killed by unknown attackers.
26 year old Akshay Vishal of Secunderanadwas shot two days ago by unidentified assailants in the state of Arkansas. Vishal died in the hospital while undergoing treatment two days later.
He was an employee of Satyam Computers and was providing services for Falcon Jet Airways in America.
In the last one year, seven students from Andhra Pradesh have been killed by American anti-social elements.
The rise in the deaths of those going to America for higher studies and employment from the state has increased the worries of the thousands of families whose children are in America.
It should be known that America is preferred in Andhra Pradesh for higher studies and brighter futures.
According to the statistics of American consulate in Chennai, 100,000 American visa applications are received from India, from which the majority i.e. 40% is from Andra Pardes.
During this time, the provincial government started trying to bring the dead body of the deceased to Hyderabad.

hl.seg: America should stay alert for Enemy's attack: Bush.

doc.seg: President Bush has insisted America on being alert for enemy's attack in his last weekly speech on radio.
Mr. Bush has that even today, America's biggest threat is another attack from the terrorists. He has warned that enemies of the country are waiting patiently and are ready to attack again.
Retiring president has said that America should never be ignorant of its safety.
President Bush has also expressed best wishes for the next President Barrack Obama, who will take his oath on Tuesday.
Newly elected President Barrack Obama shed light on the historical importance of his oath taking ceremony in his speech on radio on Saturday.
He said that this ceremony is a tradition in which transfer of the power from one leader to another in a peaceful way is also highly related to the American greatness.
Mr. Obama reminded that in the entire world, there are many who can not even imagine that their leaders will retire from their positions without violence and shedding of blood.
